title: NDropdownMenuProps
description: Props for the NDropdownMenu component. A menu triggered by a button click, displaying a list of actions or navigation options.

items.description: List of menu items to display

label.description: The display text for the menu item

onClick.description: The action handler identifier triggered when the item is clicked

disabled.description: Whether this menu item is disabled and non-interactive

triggerLabel.description: Text label for the dropdown trigger button

className.description: Additional CSS class names for custom styling
